definitions.title: vb. denom. Hithp.
definitions.body: be arrogant, infuriate oneself;—Pf. 3 ms. [[הִתְעַבָָּר]] Ps 78:62; 2 ms. [[הַתְעַבַּ֫רְתָּ]] Ps 89:39; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּתְעַבֵּר]] De 3:26, [[וַיִּתְעַבָָּר]] Ps 78:21, Ps 78:59; Pt. [[מִתְעַבֵּר]] Pr 14:16, Pr 26:17; sf. [[מִתְעַבְּרוֹ]] Pr 20:2; —

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: put oneself in a fury, become furious, c. [[בְּ]] pers. De 3:26, Ps 78:62; c. [[עִם]] pers. Ps 89:39; abs. Ps 78:21, Ps 78:59 (all of God); of man, c. [[עַל]] rei Pr 26:17.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: incite one to fury for oneself Pr 20:2 (si vera l.; cf. De Ges:§ 54 f.).
